titleStmt.title: Clarastella together with poems occasional, elegies, epigrams, satyrs. / By Robert Heath, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Heath, Robert, fl. 1636-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humph. Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Princes Arms in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The words "poems .. satyrs." are bracketed together on title page.
"Occasional poems", "Elegies", and "Epigrams" each have separate dated title page and pagination; "Satyrs" (caption title) has separate pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the signe of the Princes Arms in S. Pauls Church-yard
